parameters.content:
{
  "industry": "Furniture Export and Manufacturing",
  "companyName": "Ecowoodies",
  "location": "India",
  "productServiceFocus": "Eco-friendly wooden furniture exports such as chairs, tables, and home décor made from sustainable materials",
  "targetMarket": "Furniture importers, wholesalers, and interior design companies in Europe and the Middle East",
  "keyChallenge": "Struggled to generate consistent international leads and relied heavily on trade fairs and manual outreach",
  "frameworkUsed": "AI + ASM (Attract–Sell–Monetize)",
  "campaignDuration": "45 Days",
  "initialInvestment": "$300",
  "keyResults": "120 qualified international leads, 22% conversion rate, and a 9X ROI within 6 weeks",
  "clientQuote": "AI automation helped Ecowoodies reach new buyers globally. What once took weeks to get a single response now happens automatically within hours."
}
